DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate suitability 11C-ORM-13070 positron emission tomography tracer .
DOC.criteria: Good general health ascertain detailed medical history physical examination Males 18 45 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 1830 kg/m2 Weight 5595 kg ( inclusive ) Evidence clinically significant cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , haematological , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , metabolicendocrine , neurological , urogenital psychiatric disease judge investigator Any condition require regular concomitant medication include herbal product likely need concomitant medication study . Regular consumption 21 unit alcohol per week ( 1 unit = 4 cl spirit , 13 g alcohol ) Current use nicotinecontaining product 5 cigarette equivalent/day Inability refrain use nicotinecontaining product stay study centre Inability refrain consume caffeinecontaining beverage stay study centre e.g . propensity get headache refrain caffeinecontaining beverage Blood donation loss significant amount blood within 3 month prior screen visit Abnormal 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) find clinical relevance Any abnormal value laboratory , vital sign , physical examination , may opinion investigator interfere interpretation test result cause health risk subject take part study Anatomical abnormality MRI may opinion investigator interfere interpretation PET result Participation drug study within 3 month prior entry study Participation prior PET study
